attributes.action: Put More Recycling Bins and Normal Bins on the Streets
attributes.additional_details: Whenever I go out I always see rubbish on the floor. This is a big problem in the major cities of the UK. I think by putting more recycling and normal bins on the street, we can decrease this, and hopefully make streets cleaner.
attributes.background: I think there should be more bins on streets all over the UK to stop littering.

rejection.details:
Rubbish collection is the responsibility of your local council, not the Government or House of Commons.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
